你哋其實點睇美國㗎？
1) its a mixture of marxist and fundamentalists who resent usa and the majority who see USA as an allied force in their fight against the clerics tyrannical reign.

你哋國家唔同年紀層點睇呢個deal同點睇中國？
2) the general consensus between iraniams is a major disapproval of ccp taking the mistreatment ofHong Kong amfUyghurs into account. Iranians have always taken their unity of country and ethnic minorities very seriously and resent the idea of letting a foreign Force loose in the country.

你哋係咪可以自由參與投票同選總理？老中青又點睇自由民主？
3) iran is supposed to be a democratic country on the paper but the supreme leader role mixed with the general corruption and barbaric ideologies of the people in charge has lead many to lose fate in democracy in iran because of the current situation in iran. Most middle aged and young people in iran strive to achieve a state of secular democratic government that lets parties be formed by people without the supervision of a supreme leader, whether it be a parliamentary or presidential system. Many elders and some youth heavily involved

任務資訊及說明

帳號狀態: ❌
任務排位: 暫時未入500名

/task1 - [香港直擊], 有15項
/task2 - [國際戰線], 有15項
/task3 - [緊急突發], 有0項
/task4 - [外語新聞], 有15項

/hottask - [今日熱門], 有15項, 此類不當任務

/tips1 - Twitter秘笈 - 禮儀篇
/tips2 - Twitter秘笈 - 封號篇
/tips3 - Twitter秘笈 - 改進篇

📝
1. 支援Twitter Collection, 一個link有齊所有任務，但要用瀏覽器，Twitter app開不了。
2. 新增做任務最強500排名，做完任務按[完成任務]就得，各個task完成次數都有分。排位每日更新。
3. 在任務下方有個[完成任務]按鈕, 用來標記目前任務已完成。下次再讀取任務，只有新任務才會顯示🆕
4. 想搵更多人做任務？直接俾呢個地址啦 👉 https://t.me/TwitterHelpBot
5. 歡迎加入Twitter文宣組： 👉 https://t.me/twitter4hk
